item.title: National Guard member dies as ambush in U.S. capital becomes political flashpoint
item.description: A National Guard member died on Thursday after being shot near the White House in an ambush that investigators say was carried out by an Afghan nation...

item.title: National Guard soldiers shot in 'targeted' attack near White House
item.description: Two members of the National Guard were shot on Wednesday in a busy area near the White House in downtown Washington, officials said.

item.title: Judge dismisses Trump election interference racketeering case in Georgia

item.title: Sen. Jim Justice and his wife sued for, agree to pay $5 million in unpaid taxes from 2009
item.description: A federal judge recently ruled the coal mining heir owed more than $29 million in damages for breaching a contract with a bond-surety company.
